errors.symptom: User initially copied the target class value as datatype instead of referencing similar properties
errors.trigger: While defining the SHACL constraint datatype, user copied 'journal article' from the shape's target class: 'Journal article a me mi pare che qua non ci sia niente'. User then self-corrected: 'No ho sbagliato. Chiaro, chiaro, chiaro. Perché questo è la shape che la target class', realizing journal article is the shape's target class, not a property datatype

errors.symptom: User acknowledged complete unfamiliarity with YAML display rules configuration format
errors.trigger: At the start of the task, user explicitly stated: 'Dammi tempo. Perché io questa roba non l'ho mai vista prima d'ora' (line 179), indicating no prior exposure to this configuration format

errors.symptom: User struggled to understand the structure and meaning of display rule properties
errors.trigger: While examining the YAML file, user expressed confusion about multiple properties: 'Questo veramente non so cosa sia' and 'Display prop non è comunque relazionato a quello che devo fare', showing difficulty comprehending the configuration schema

errors.symptom: User questioned the relevance of certain configuration properties when support_search is set to false
errors.trigger: While configuring display rules, user wondered about property necessity: 'min chart support search 2 penso sia irrelevant target self search target self penso che entrambe siano irrelevant nel momento stesso in cui dici false no? Lo scopriremo soltanto vivendo', uncertain whether these properties matter when search support is disabled
